articles.title: British Airways stops selling new tickets for short-haul flights from Heathrow - as European airport extends capacity cap - Sky News
articles.content: British Airways has suspended selling short-haul flights from Heathrow for at least a fortnight, Sky News understands, as another European airport announced it was extending a cap on passenger number… [+4044 chars]
